messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Hi, Nice to be here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Leslie! syndi ...since  we can t know what knowledge will be most needed in the future, it is senseless  to try to teach it in advance. Instead, we should
messages.messageBody:
Hi Leslie!
syndi

"...since we can't know what knowledge will be most needed in the future, it
is senseless to try to teach it in advance. Instead, we should try to turn
out people who love learning so much and learn so well that they will be able
to learn whatever needs to be learned."
-- _John Holt_ (http://www.quoteworld.org/author.php?thetext=John+Holt)

me know when you can play and welcome to the list :0). ~Rue

messages.subject: Hi, Nice to be here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been lurking for a few days. We re here in Mass. south of Boston. Hi Rue! I m looking forward to meeting some of you at the live and learn conference
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I've been lurking for a few days. We're here in Mass. south of Boston. Hi Rue!

I'm looking forward to meeting some of you at the live and learn conference ths summer.

Leslie

Mom to Julia (eight) and James (4.5)
